name: cURLUploader
description: Use cURL to upload files with FTP, FTPS, SFTP, HTTP, and more.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: files
inputs.label: Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: File(s) to be uploaded. Wildcards can be used. For example, `**/*.zip` for all ZIP files in all subfolders.

inputs.name: serviceEndpoint
inputs.label: Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: The service endpoint with the credentials for the server authentication. Use the Generic connection type for the service endpoint.

inputs.name: username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the username for server authentication.

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the password for server authentication. Use a new build variable with its lock enabled on the Variables tab to encrypt this value.

inputs.name: url
inputs.label: URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the URL to where the file(s) will be uploaded. The directory should end with a trailing slash. Possible URL protocols include `DICT://`, `FILE://`, `FTP://`, `FTPS://`, `GOPHER://`, `HTTP://`, `HTTPS://`, `IMAP://`, `IMAPS://`, `LDAP://`, `LDAPS://`, `POP3://`, `POP3S://`, `RTMP://`, `RTSP://`, `SCP://`, `SFTP://`, `SMTP://`, `SMTPS://`, `TELNET://` and `TFTP://`.

inputs.name: remotePath
inputs.label: Remote Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: If supplied, this is the sub-folder on the remote server for the URL supplied in the credentials.

inputs.name: options
inputs.label: Optional Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional arguments that will be passed to cURL.

inputs.name: redirectStderr
inputs.label: Redirect Standard Error to Standard Out
inputs.helpMarkDown: Adds '--stderr -' as an argument to cURL. By default, cURL writes its progress bar to stderr, which is interpreted by the build as error output. Enabling this checkbox suppresses that behavior.

messages.NoMatchingFilesFound: No matching files were found with search pattern: %s
messages.CurlNotFound: curl was not found in the PATH.
messages.NotAllFilesUploaded: Not all files were uploaded; Uploaded: %d; Total: %d
messages.IncompleteEndpoint: The service endpoint does not contain all required fields.
